visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle grid patterns (bg-grid-slate-200/[0.04]) in the dashboard background to give a technical feel.
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-md for floating elements. Avoid large, soft diffusions.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid borders are preferred over shadows for separation. Use 'divide-y' and 'divide-x' utilities.

general: Implement a 'Naval Command' aesthetic: Deep Blue sidebar, White/Gray content area.
Use 'Barlow Condensed' for all headings (h1-h3) to give a tactical/military feel.
Use 'IBM Plex Sans' for all body text, tables, and inputs for maximum legibility.
Ensure high contrast for all text. No gray-on-gray.
Use the 'High Density Grid' (Mode B) for the dashboard. Pack data tightly but clearly.
The sidebar must be fixed on the left, dark navy background (#001433), with white text/icons.
Active sidebar items should have a gold (#C5A005) left border or accent.
Use the provided vehicle images for the 'Fleet' section. Do not use placeholders.
Mock data must be realistic: Use Ecuadorian license plates (e.g., GSA-1234), realistic locations (Guayaquil, Esmeraldas, Manta), and naval ranks (Capit√°n de Corbeta, Teniente de Nav√≠o).

specific_pages.dashboard: Must include a 'Tactical Map' (simulated) and 'Readiness Status' cards (Operativo, Mantenimiento, Cr√≠tico).
specific_pages.vehicle_detail: Include a 'Service History' timeline and 'Fuel Consumption' chart.
specific_pages.login: Simple, secure-looking login with the Naval Seal/Logo centered.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) sparingly, mainly for overlays.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
